statements: SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_conditions WHERE weather_description = 'Sunny' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location_name, weather_description FROM weather_conditions WHERE wind_speed < 10;
SELECT temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT location_name, temperature, wind_speed, weather_description FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT location_id, wind_speed FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature < 20 AND location_name = 'New York'
SELECT location_id, weather_description FROM weather_conditions WHERE wind_speed >= 15
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_name LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions;
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location_name, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT location_name, sport_name FROM sports_locations;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 30 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT location_name, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM weather_conditions GROUP BY location_name HAVING max_temperature > 30 ORDER BY max_temperature DESC;

SELECT w.location_name, s.sport_name FROM weather_conditions w INNER JOIN sports_locations s ON w.location_id = s.location_id WHERE w.temperature < 20 ORDER BY s.sport_name ASC, w.location_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM weather_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM weather_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT condition_description, temperature FROM weather_conditions ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT activity_name, difficulty_level FROM sports_activities WHERE location_id = 2 AND condition_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sports_activities WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM weather_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM weather_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Hiking' AND difficulty_level = 'Moderate';
SELECT activity_name, condition_description, temperature FROM sports_activities JOIN weather_conditions ON sports_activities.condition_id = weather_conditions.condition_id WHERE temperature > 25;

SELECT location_name, condition_description, humidity FROM weather_locations JOIN weather_conditions ON weather_locations.location_id = weather_conditions.condition_id WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM locations WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location_id, location_name, temperature, weather_conditions FROM locations WHERE temperature < 10;
SELECT * FROM sports WHERE sport_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM locations WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT sport_name, sport_type FROM sports WHERE sport_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM weather_reports WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, location_name FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, distance_miles FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY distance_miles DESC;
SELECT spot_name, wave_height, water_temperature FROM surfing_spots WHERE water_temperature > 70;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_rating, route_length FROM rock_climbing_routes WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT trail_name, distance_miles FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY distance_miles DESC;
SELECT spot_name, wave_height, water_temperature FROM surfing_spots WHERE wave_height > 5.0 AND water_temperature > 70.0;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT resort_name, snow_depth FROM skiing_resorts WHERE temperature < 0;
